title: Win signed copy of new football book 'Drawing the 92'
description: Win a signed copy of 'Drawing the 92', a collection of drawings by artist Jamie B Edwards of every single Premier League and Football League stadium in the country.
content: Ten years in the making, Jamie travelled more than 25,000 miles to achieve his ambition and an exhibition of all the drawings is on display at the National Football Museum, Manchester, until the end of January.From Accrington Stanley's Wham Stadium to Yeovil Town's Huish Park, with a couple of diversions to Wembley Stadium and the new London Stadium, Jamie has drawn the stadiums that have become the second homes to generations of football fans.His drawings are redolent in colour, often tinted with the traditional hues of the home team, and have an inimitable graphic feel that celebrates not only the buildings but the settings in which they exist.He is arguably the most famous football stadium artist in the world and his pictures have sold in their thousands, with commissions commanded from The FA, UEFA and top football clubs worldwide.For the first time, his life's work has been collected together in a stunning volume that not only includes his unique drawings but also brief written descriptions of all the stadiums with quotes from celebrity fans and ex-players.We're offering you the chance to win a signed copy of the book. To win, just answer the question below.Closing date: Friday January 19
